tool.name: List MASC
tool.description: Lists all document ID values available in MASC.
tool.help:
Obtains a list of ID values for all documents available in the MASC (Manually Annotated Sub-Corpus) from the Open American National Corpus.
The ID values are saved to the output file with one ID per line.

citations.citation: @inproceedings{Ide:2010:MAS:1858842.1858855, author = {Ide, Nancy and Fellbaum, Christiane and Baker, Collin and Passonneau, Rebecca}, title = {The Manually Annotated Sub-corpus: A Community Resource for and by the People}, booktitle = {Proceedings of the ACL 2010 Conference Short Papers}, series = {ACLShort '10}, year = {2010}, location = {Uppsala, Sweden}, pages = {68--73}, numpages = {6}, url = {http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1858842.1858855}, acmid = {1858855}, publisher = {Association for Computational Linguistics}, address = {Stroudsburg, PA, USA}, }
